title: Container Monitoring in a Simplified Way
author: DISCURSIVE
content: readme.md netsil application operations center (aoc) is next-gen observability analytics tool modern cloud applications. netsil aoc helps sres devops improve reliability performance api microservices-driven production applications. the heart the aoc is auto-discovered service topology map. visualizes service dependencies operational metrics practitioners work collaboratively across teams.introductioninstallation is done two parts: netsil aoc the netsil collectors. collectors are installed your application instances (vms containerized environments) mirror service interactions & metrics to netsil aoc real- analysis. may install collectors a variety environments, independent the aoc environment. instance, may run aoc a standalone docker container, install collectors kubernetes.documentationrefer our documentation site installation instructions, api definitions, user guides, more.support help please join public slack channel email support@netsil.com
